plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.blandfruitbush.desc
blandfruit: Distant cousin of the rotberry, the pear-shaped produce of the blandfruit bush tastes like caked dust. The fruit is gross and unsubstantial but isn't poisonous. Perhaps it could be cooked.
无味果: 腐莓的远亲，来自无味果树丛的梨状产物，尝起来犹如一团泥巴。果实粗糙且松软，但并没有毒性。也许可以煮食。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.blindweed.desc
blandfruit: Upon being touched a blindweed perishes in a bright flash of light. The flash is strong enough to disorient for several seconds.
无味果: 在被碰到后，致盲草会瞬间枯萎并释放一道强光。这道光足以刺伤受害者双眼，使其暂时失明。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.blindweed.warden_desc
blandfruit: _The Warden_ will channel a blindweed's energy into a temporary shroud of invisibility, instead of being disoriented.
无味果: _守望者_能将致盲草的能量化为一层短时间的隐形迷雾，而不会被致盲。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.mageroyal.desc
blandfruit: The mageroyal's prickly flowers contain a chemical which is known for its properties as a strong neutralizing agent. Anything that steps in this plant will be cleansed of many negative effects.
无味果: 魔皇草的带刺花朵含有一种化学物质，因其强大的中和性质而闻名。任何踏入这株植物的东西将会被净化掉许多负面效果。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.mageroyal.warden_desc
blandfruit: In addition to the neutralizing effect, _the Warden_ will become temporarily immune to all area-bound effects when stepping on mageroyal.
无味果: 当踩踏一株魔皇草时，_守望者_在获得中和效果以外，还能短暂地对所有环境影响免疫。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.earthroot.desc
blandfruit: When a creature touches an earthroot, its roots create a kind of immobile natural armor around it.
无味果: 碰到地缚根后，它的根系会在踩踏者周边形成某种无法移动的天然护甲。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.earthroot.warden_desc
blandfruit: The roots of an earthroot plant will move with _the Warden_, providing her mobile barkskin armor.
无味果: _守望者_能将这种护甲转化为可移动的树肤护甲。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.earthroot$armor.desc
blandfruit:
A kind of natural, immobile armor made of bark and twine.

This herbal armor will block %d damage from any physical hit, until it eventually runs out of durability and collapses.

As the armor is immobile, moving will cause it to break apart and be lost.

Armor remaining: %d.
无味果:
这是一种由层层树皮和藤蔓盘结而成的，不可移动的天然护甲。

每当你受到物理攻击时，植被护甲都会吸收%d点伤害，直到其耐久被耗尽并瓦解。

该护甲是不可移动的，所以一旦你离开原位护甲便会被破坏，消失不见。

剩余护甲量：%d点

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.fadeleaf.desc
blandfruit: Touching a fadeleaf will teleport any creature to a random place on the current level.
无味果: 任何触碰到消逝草的生物都会被传送到当前层的一个随机地点。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.fadeleaf.warden_desc
blandfruit: The teleportation effect of fadeleaf is more potent for _the Warden_, teleporting her back to the end of the previous dungeon level.
无味果: _守望者_能进一步发挥消逝草的空间魔力，直接回到上一层的下楼梯处。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.firebloom.desc
blandfruit: When something touches a firebloom, it bursts into flames.
无味果: 烈焰花被任何物品触碰到时，都会化为一团火焰。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.firebloom.warden_desc
blandfruit: When she tramples a firebloom, _the Warden_ will be briefly imbued with flame instead of being harmed.
无味果: _守望者_能将有害的火焰转化为短时的烈焰之力。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.icecap.desc
blandfruit: Upon being touched, an icecap lets out a puff of freezing pollen. The freezing effect is much stronger if the environment is wet.
无味果: 冰冠花在被接触到时会喷射出一团能冻结周遭的花粉。冻结效果会在潮湿环境中大幅增强。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.icecap.warden_desc
blandfruit: When she tramples an icecap, _the Warden_ will be briefly imbued with frost instead of being harmed.
无味果: _守望者_能将有害的冰冻转化为短时的寒霜之力。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.plant.warden_desc
blandfruit: This plant has no special effect when used by the Warden.
无味果: 守望者踩踏这株植物不会获得额外效果。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.plant$seed.info
blandfruit: Throw this seed to the place where you want to grow a plant.\n\n%s
无味果: 把这粒种子丢到你想长出一株植物的地方。\n\n%s

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.rotberry.desc
blandfruit: The berries of a young rotberry shrub taste like sweet, sweet death. Over a few years, this rotberry shrub will grow into another rot heart. When trampled, a young rotberry will produce a small puff of toxic gas.
无味果: 未成熟的腐莓丛结出的莓果尝起来更像是甜蜜的死亡。经过成年累月的生长，这株腐莓丛终会成熟为另一棵腐莓核心。被踩踏后，这株未成熟的腐莓会释放少量毒气。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.rotberry.warden_desc
blandfruit: Normally a rotberry bush only produces a little gas when trampled, but _the Warden_ is able to harness energy from it to temporarily boost her strength!
无味果: 遭到践踏时腐莓丛通常只会喷出一小股毒气，但_守望者_却能联结其中的魔力，在短时间内提升力量！

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.sorrowmoss.desc
blandfruit: A sorrowmoss is a flower (not a moss) with razor-sharp petals, coated with a deadly venom.
无味果: 断肠苔并不是一种苔藓，而是一种有含有剧毒，花瓣利如刀片的花。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.sorrowmoss.warden_desc
blandfruit: When she tramples a sorrowmoss, _the Warden_ will be briefly imbued with toxin instead of being harmed.
无味果: _守望者_能将有害的毒素转化为短时的毒素之力。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.starflower.desc
blandfruit: A rare plant, starflower is said to grant holy power to whomever touches it.
无味果: 星陨花较为罕见，据说其能够为任何接触它的人赋予神圣之力。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.starflower.warden_desc
blandfruit: In addition to being blessed, _the Warden_ will gain a significant amount of wand recharging when she tramples a starflower.
无味果: _守望者_在踩踏星陨花时不仅能受到祝福，还能获得较长时间的法杖充能。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.stormvine.desc
blandfruit: Gravity affects the stormvine plant strangely, allowing its whispy blue tendrils to 'hang' on the air. Anything caught in the vine is affected by this, and becomes disoriented.
无味果: 引力似乎并不能正常地作用在风暴藤上，它蓝色的藤蔓能够"挂"在空中。任何被风暴藤缠到的生物也被这种奇怪的引力影响，并失去方向感。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.stormvine.warden_desc
blandfruit: _The Warden_ is able to control the gravitational effect of stormvine, and will briefly levitate when she tramples one.
无味果: 守望者能够操纵风暴藤的魔力，因而在踩踏之后可以获得短暂飘浮的能力。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.sungrass.desc
blandfruit: Sungrass is renowned for its sap's slow but effective healing properties.
无味果: 阳春草因其汁液缓慢但显著的疗伤效果而家喻户晓。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.sungrass.warden_desc
blandfruit: _The Warden_ can receive healing from trampled sungrass even if she moves away from it.
无味果: _守望者_能将阳春草的治疗魔力随身携带。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.sungrass$health.desc
blandfruit:
Sungrass possesses excellent healing properties, though it is much slower than a potion of healing.

Moving off the plant will break the healing effect.

Healing remaining: %d.
无味果:
阳春草拥有优秀的治疗能力，尽管治疗速率比治疗药剂慢很多。

脱离植株将会打断治疗效果。

剩余治疗量：%d

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.swiftthistle.desc
blandfruit: When trampled, swiftthistle will briefly accelerate the flow of time around it, allowing the trampler to perform several actions instantly.
无味果: 被踩踏后，速行蓟会加速周围的时间流动，让踩踏者可以瞬间行动数次

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.swiftthistle.warden_desc
blandfruit: In addition to gaining instantaneous actions, _the Warden_ will also get a brief haste boost when trampling swiftthistle.
无味果: _守望者_踩踏速行蓟不仅能获得瞬时行动的机会，还能在短时间内极速奔跑。

plants.blandfruitbush.name: plants.swiftthistle$timebubble.desc
blandfruit: A small bubble of accelerated time, allowing actions to be performed instantly. Attacking or using magic will break this effect however.\n\nTurns remaining: %s.
无味果:
这是一个加速时间运行的气泡。

你可以在气泡中瞬间进行多次行动，但是攻击或施法都会打断这个效果。

剩余时长：%s回合
